name: Set Query
Read
query:
from(bucket: "aeroponics")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "first")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
